title: Oriental Noodles with Plum and Ginger Duck
ingredients: ['2 large or 3 medium skinless duck breast fillets, about 400g total weight', '2 tbsp soy sauce', '2 tbsp rice wine or dry sherry', 'a good pinch of ground Szechuan peppercorns or five-spice powder, or to taste', '2 tbsp olive oil', '3 spring onions, cut into 2cm pieces', '3cm piece fresh root ginger, peeled and grated', '300g sugarsnap peas or mange-touts', '5 tbsp plum sauce', '150ml chicken or vegetable stock, made with a stock cube', '375g instant egg or rice noodles', '25g fresh coriander']
